Text:
1280 X 536. Not 1280 X 720.

This is not 720p.

Another great upload by one and only gayrukhfan.
@girodice, yes, it IS 720P.  The movie was not shot in 16:9, it is a 21:9 movie, so it has black bars which takes up some of the 720 vertical pixels.
Why is he noob? This is indeed 1280x536 so how can it be "720p"? It's much lower than 720p - it's 536p
Bad news topk, you're a noob as well.
the ppl who think it is not 720p: t.qkme.me/3qc53x.jpg

IT IS 720p but the movie is FILMED in 2:35:1 aspect ratio widescreen, so you'll see bars on top and bottom.

Technical Specs (FROM IMDB)
Runtime: 95 min
Sound Mix: Datasat  | Dolby Digital
Color: Color (3D Stereoscopic)
Aspect Ratio: 2.35 : 1

This film was shot in an aspect ratio of 2.35:1 (for every 1 unit high it's 2.35 units wide) which means it should be 1280 pixels wide by 536 pixels tall (with no black bars that is).  Do a little research before complaining about whether or not it's 720p lol.
